title: Calories in In-N-Out Hamburger
meta_description: Discover hamburger in n out calories: about 390 kcal per burger, plus full nutrition breakdown, macros, and variations like cheeseburger.
assumptions: Standard In-N-Out hamburger: toasted bun, 100% beef patty, lettuce, tomato, onion, spread; no cheese or modifications.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by location, customizations, and exact preparation; values based on official In-N-Out data. Check app or menu for latest.

quick_answer.text: One In-N-Out hamburger has 390 kcal, 16 g protein, and 17 g fat.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts fields for easy comparison.

tweaks.label: Animal style (extra spread, mustard, grilled onions)
Protein style (wrapped in lettuce, no bun)

faqs.q: How many calories in a hamburger in n out?
faqs.a: A standard In-N-Out hamburger has 390 calories.

faqs.q: What are the macros for In-N-Out hamburger?
faqs.a: 39 g carbs, 16 g protein, 19 g fat per hamburger.

faqs.q: Is the In-N-Out hamburger high in sodium?
faqs.a: Yes, about 730 mg sodium per burger from the spread and bun.

faqs.q: How does cheese affect hamburger in n out calories?
faqs.a: Adding cheese increases calories by ~100 to 490 total.

faqs.q: What's the fiber in an In-N-Out hamburger?
faqs.a: Around 2 g fiber, mainly from the lettuce and bun.
